column5: Super affordable home close to Sea World...Lackland AFB....sleeps 10 people....KING in master bedroom, 2 twins in secondary bedrooms...1 QUEEN in secondary bedroom....1 QUEEN in study....55 inch flat screen tv located in living room. 50 inch HDTV located in game room...40 inch tv located in Master Bedroom. 24 inch tv located in secondary bedroom. Home has cable tv and wifi! Grill on the patio and super close to Sea World and Aquatica! Neighborhood Pool!!!!
